de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.advancedProcessing.featureTable

Class Column

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.advancedProcessing.featureTable.Column
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicColumn, Field, Field

    public abstract class Column
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates all column metadata used in the FeatureTable.

    It specifies data types and whether or not the column is a feature and generates a globally unique full name as a combination of the parent table name and the column's own name. This name can be used to uniquely reference a column even in nested combinations of feature tables.

    • Method Detail

      • setParentTable

        public void setParentTable(FeatureTable featureTable)
        Sets the parent table of the column to the feature table.

        The parent table of a column should be the feature table that holds its data.

        Parameters:
        featureTable - The parent table of the column.

      • getFullName

        public final java.lang.String getFullName()
        Returns the full name of the column following the pattern lt;parentTable.namegt;_lt;namegt;. This ensures globally unique full names within the table environment.
        Returns:
        The full name of the column

        public abstract java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the column.

        The name of the column

        public abstract boolean isFeature()
        Returns whether or not the column is a feature.

        Whether or not the column is a feature
